0.user_question: Will was working as a sacker at a grocery store where he made 8 dollars an hour. On Monday he worked 8 hours and on Tuesday he worked 2 hours. How much money did Will make in those two days?

ost_step.1: Determine how much Will made each day based on the number of hours he worked. He made $8/hour.
ost_step.2: Multiply his hourly wage by the number of hours he worked each day.

direct_answer.text:
Will earned $8/hour * 8 hours = $64 on Monday.
He earned $8/hour * 2 hours = $16 on Tuesday.
So he earned a total of $64 + $16 = $80 in those two days.
The answer is: $80.
